turns.content: I was charged $99.99 for a subscription on January 15th, but I cancelled it on January 10th. I want a refund.

I understand your concern. Let me check your account. I can see that you did cancel on January 10th, but the charge went through on January 15th. This appears to be a billing system delay. I'll process a full refund of $99.99 to your original payment method. The refund should appear within 5-7 business days.
Can you also make sure this doesn't happen again? I don't want to be charged after cancellation.
